head.supplied: 19/8/86. ¶ ¶ Best thanks, esteemed Mr Tepper, for sending the two copies of your nice paper "Native plants". ¶ It should especially contribute to bringing the beautiful flowering plants of South Aus...

div.p: RB MSS M198, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

p.seg: Besten Dank, geehrter Herr Tepper, für die Übersendung der zwei Exemplare von Ihrer netten Abhandlung "Native plants". Solche sollte besonders dazu beitragen, die schönbluhende Gewachse Südaustraliens zu Horticutur Ehre zu bringen.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Best thanks, esteemed Mr Tepper, for sending the two copies of your nice paper "Native plants".
Tepper (1886). The library at the Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne has a copy of this work inscribed 'To Baron Sir Ferd. von Mueller, K.C.M.G., M & Ph.D., F.R.S. | With the Author's Compliments'. It should especially contribute to bringing the beautiful flowering plants of South Australia to horticultural honour.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
